content.prompt: In the sentence, Vidit autem vir omnium sapientissimus in magno se fore periculo is translated

choices.label: the wisest man sees that there was great danger in everyone
he saw, however, that the wisest man of all was in great danger
the wisest man of all saw, however, that he would be in great danger
the wisest man, however, sees that everyone would be in great danger

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
